response.overview: Five GCN presenters are heading to the cycling heartland of Girona to take on 6 epic, tough, and hilarious challenges. Each armed with a cheap bike, costing no more than £200, they’ll compete head to head in a variety of outrageous challenges that will push their friendships, skills, and cheap bikes, to the limit. From a rat race through Girona’s historic old town to racing up one of Catalonia’s most notable climbs;  the gloves are off.  Representing their nations, they’ll be battling it out for presenter supremacy, GCN Channel bragging rights, and eternal glory. Get ready for a laugh a minute rollercoaster ride where anything is possible!
response.title: Cheap Bike Challenge
